content: houndstooth forever is a vibrant take on the classic crochet houndstooth pattern worked into a fun crocheted infinity scarf skills knowledge of basic crochet stitches techniques and terminology is assumed the pattern is worked in rounds changing colour at the end of each round chainless foundation stitches foundation single and double_crochet - us terms are used to start the project and the rest of the pattern is worked using us single and double_crochet materials the pattern uses a 4 5mm crochet hook and around 200g / 450m dk weight yarn in 2 colours the item pictured used the following yarn yarn a 1 ball x women s institute home grown dk wool from hobbycraft 100% wool 100g ball = 225m shade ecru yarn b 1 ball x bfl dk from knitting needle lane hand dyed 100% blue faced leicester 100g hank = 225m shade sweet shop size this infinity scarf is one size based on a standard women s size small and intended for adult use only the finished item measures 125cm long by 24cm deep after blocking the pattern is written in english using us crochet terms and is delivered via pdf download the pattern is for personal use only and may not be shared or reproduced without prior written consent copyright 2022 dora does limited registered in england no 13992263
